revision.comment: per [[WT:NORM]], ensure "One blank line before all headings" (except the first)
revision.text: ==Matal== ===Etymology=== From {{inh|mfh|cdc-pro|*ydn}}. ===Pronunciation=== *{{IPA|mfh|[yáwdì]}}<ref>{{R:mfh:Rossing|page=51}}</ref> ===Noun=== {{head|mfh|noun}} # [[eye]] #:{{ux|mfh|"Mana asa à akul, kà gəɗahakulaŋ ma?" "Məŋga, kà '''yewdi '''gami aŋa manəŋla" (Mata 20:33)|"What do you want me to do for you?" They said to him, "Lord, that our '''eyes''' would see". (Matthew 20:33)|ref=<ref>http://listen.bible.is/MFHWYI/Matt/20#33</ref>}} #: {{ux|mfh|''''Yewdi '''mapəlay la '''yewdi''', [[sliɗ]] bay mapəlay la sliɗ (Mata 3:38)|An '''eye '''for an '''eye '''and a tooth for a tooth. (Matthew 5:38)|ref=<ref>http://listen.bible.is/MFHWYI/Mata/3#38</ref>}} ===References=== <references/> [[Category:mfh:Body]]
